verses.text:
Break, e-ter-nal day! Break, e-ter-nal day!
Dis-perse the gloom of sin and woe, Break, e-ter-nal day!

Let the light of heav-en shine, Let the light of heav-en shine,
In this heart of mine, Break, e-ter-nal day!

Come, thou bless-ed Prince of Peace, Come, thou bless-ed Prince of Peace,
Bid all con-flict cease, Break, e-ter-nal day!

chorus.text:
Break, e-ter-nal day! Break, e-ter-nal day!
Dis-perse the gloom of sin and woe, Break, e-ter-nal day!
